name: Jonghyun Kim, Ph.D.
department: Dept. of Computer and Information Security
biography: Jonghyun Kim received the Ph.D. degree in computer science from the University of Oklahoma, USA in 2005. He was a researcher with the Samsung Electronics in 1995-1997. He was a principal researcher with the Electronics Telecommunications Research Institute in 2005-2024, He is currently a Professor at the Department of Computer and Information Security at Sejong University, Seoul, Korea. He was also involved in standardization activities as a vice chair of WP1 and a rapporteur of Q.4 (cybersecurity) in ITU-T Study Group 17. His research interests include information Security, Cyber Security, Cloud Security (SECaaS), AI/ML-based malware detection and 5G/6G security and Standardization.
professionalExperience: 2024.09 ~ Current: Professor, Department of Computer and Information Security, Sejong University
2021.02 ~ 2024.08: Professor, University of Science and Technology (UST), South Korea
2005.07 ~ 2024.08: Researcher & Manager, Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute (ETRI), South Korea
2020.05 ~ 2020.12: System Engineer, Samsung SDS Co., Ltd.
